org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.base64
Class Base64Encoder

java.lang.Object
  org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.oneone.OneToOneEncoder
      org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.base64.Base64Encoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelDownstreamHandler, ChannelHandler
public class Base64Encoder
extends OneToOneEncoder

Encodes a ChannelBuffer into a Base64-encoded ChannelBuffer. A typical setup for TCP/IP would be: 

 ChannelPipeline pipeline = ...;

 // Decoders
 pipeline.addLast("frameDecoder", new DelimiterBasedFrameDecoder(80, Delimiters.nulDelimiter()));
 pipeline.addLast("base64Decoder", new Base64Decoder());

 // Encoder
 pipeline.addLast("base64Encoder", new Base64Encoder());
